original_text: After they had further proclaimed the word of the Lord and testified about Jesus, Peter and John returned to Jerusalem, preaching the gospel in many Samaritan villages.
korean_text: 두 사도가 주의 말씀을 증언하여 말한 후 예루살렘으로 돌아갈새 사마리아인의 여러 마을에서 복음을 전하니라

sentences.original_text: After they had further proclaimed the word of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 주의 말씀을 더욱 전파한 후에

sentences.original_text: Peter and John returned to Jerusalem
preaching the gospel in many Samaritan villages
